texts.Brand:Name: Shahin AI
texts.Meta:Description: Shahin AI - AI-powered GRC platform that automates compliance, monitors risks continuously, and delivers actionable intelligence. Built for Saudi & GCC regulatory frameworks (NCA ECC, SAMA CSF, PDPL).
texts.Meta:Keywords: GRC platform, governance risk compliance, AI agents, NCA ECC, SAMA CSF, PDPL, Saudi compliance, KSA regulations, automated compliance, risk management
texts.Footer:Description: Enterprise-grade GRC platform powered by AI. Automate compliance, monitor risks continuously, and deliver actionable intelligence for Saudi & GCC organizations.

texts.Home:Title: Shahin AI - Enterprise-Grade GRC, Reinvented by AI
texts.Home:Hero:Headline: Enterprise-Grade GRC, Reinvented by AI
texts.Home:Hero:SubHeadline: Automate compliance, monitor risks continuously, and deliver actionable intelligence with 12 specialized AI agents
texts.Home:Hero:Description: Shahin AI transforms governance, risk, and compliance operations with intelligent automation. Built for Saudi & GCC regulatory frameworks (NCA ECC, SAMA CSF, PDPL).
texts.Home:Hero:TrustedBy: Trusted by leading Saudi banks, insurance companies, and regulated entities
texts.Home:Value:Title: Why Leading Organizations Choose Shahin AI
texts.Home:Value:Subtitle: Four core capabilities that transform your GRC operations
texts.Home:Value:1:Title: AI Automation That Actually Works
texts.Home:Value:1:Desc: 99.4% faster evidence collection. 98.5% success rate in control assessments. Our 12 specialized AI agents handle the repetitive work so your team can focus on strategic decisions.
texts.Home:Value:2:Title: Continuous Compliance Monitoring
texts.Home:Value:2:Desc: Never miss a deadline or requirement change. Real-time monitoring of NCA ECC, SAMA CSF, PDPL, and custom frameworks. Automated alerts before issues become problems.
texts.Home:Value:3:Title: Human-in-the-Loop Intelligence
texts.Home:Value:3:Desc: AI suggests, you decide. Every recommendation includes confidence scores and audit trails. Your compliance team maintains full control with AI-powered assistance.
texts.Home:Value:4:Title: Built for Saudi & GCC Compliance
texts.Home:Value:4:Desc: Pre-configured for NCA ECC (all levels), SAMA CSF, PDPL, with Arabic-first UX. Deployment in Saudi data centers. Enterprise security that meets local requirements.

texts.Home:Testimonials:Title: What GRC Leaders Say About Shahin AI
texts.Home:Testimonial:1:Quote: Shahin AI reduced our audit preparation time from 6 weeks to 3 days. The AI agents handle evidence collection while our team focuses on strategic risk management. Game changer for our compliance operations.
texts.Home:Testimonial:1:Name: Chief Compliance Officer
texts.Home:Testimonial:2:Quote: We achieved NCA ECC Level 3 certification 40% faster than planned. The continuous monitoring and automated gap analysis gave us confidence throughout the entire process.
texts.Home:Testimonial:2:Name: CISO
texts.Home:Testimonial:3:Quote: The Arabic-first interface and SAMA CSF pre-configuration made adoption seamless. Our compliance team was productive from day one without extensive training.
texts.Home:Testimonial:3:Name: Head of Risk Management

texts.Agents:Title: AI Agents - Shahin AI GRC Platform
texts.Agents:Headline: 12 Specialized AI Agents for Enterprise GRC
texts.Agents:Subtitle: Each agent masters a specific compliance function, working together to automate your GRC operations
texts.Agents:What:Title: What is a GRC AI Agent?
texts.Agents:What:Desc: A GRC AI Agent is a specialized autonomous system trained on a specific compliance domain. Each agent combines machine learning, natural language processing, and rule-based logic to execute GRC tasks with human-level accuracy but at machine speed. Agents work 24/7, learn from your environment, and collaborate to deliver enterprise-grade results.
texts.Agents:How:Title: How AI Agents Work Together
texts.Agents:How:Step1: Continuous Monitoring: Agents scan your environment 24/7 for changes, risks, and requirements
texts.Agents:How:Step2: Intelligent Analysis: Machine learning models evaluate data and identify patterns
texts.Agents:How:Step3: Collaborative Decision: Agents consult each other for complex scenarios
texts.Agents:How:Step4: Human Review: Critical decisions include confidence scores for your team's review
texts.Agents:How:Step5: Automated Execution: Approved actions execute automatically with full audit trails
texts.Agents:Detail:1:Name: Control Assessment Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:1:Desc: Automates control testing, evidence evaluation, and assessment scoring across all frameworks
texts.Agents:Detail:2:Name: Evidence Collection Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:2:Desc: Automatically gathers, organizes, and validates compliance evidence from connected systems
texts.Agents:Detail:3:Name: Risk Assessment Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:3:Desc: Continuously identifies, scores, and prioritizes risks across your technology and business environment
texts.Agents:Detail:4:Name: Policy Analysis Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:4:Desc: Maps policies to regulatory requirements and controls, identifying coverage gaps
texts.Agents:Detail:5:Name: Regulatory Change Monitor
texts.Agents:Detail:5:Desc: Tracks NCA, SAMA, PDPL, and other regulatory updates, alerting you to changes that impact compliance
texts.Agents:Detail:6:Name: Audit Preparation Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:6:Desc: Prepares comprehensive audit packages with all required evidence and documentation
texts.Agents:Detail:7:Name: Vendor Risk Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:7:Desc: Assesses and monitors third-party vendor compliance, security, and performance
texts.Agents:Detail:8:Name: Incident Response Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:8:Desc: Analyzes security and compliance incidents, recommending remediation actions
texts.Agents:Detail:9:Name: Report Generation Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:9:Desc: Creates executive dashboards, regulatory reports, and custom analytics on demand
texts.Agents:Detail:10:Name: Compliance Calendar Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:10:Desc: Manages all compliance deadlines, regulatory milestones, and assessment schedules
texts.Agents:Detail:11:Name: Gap Analysis Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:11:Desc: Identifies compliance gaps across frameworks and prioritizes remediation efforts
texts.Agents:Detail:12:Name: Action Plan Agent
texts.Agents:Detail:12:Desc: Creates, assigns, and tracks remediation action plans with automated follow-up

texts.Solutions:Title: Solutions - Shahin AI GRC Platform
texts.Solutions:Headline: Comprehensive GRC Automation
texts.Solutions:Subtitle: End-to-end platform for governance, risk, and compliance management
texts.Solutions:Feature:1:Title: Comprehensive Automation
texts.Solutions:Feature:1:Desc: 12 specialized AI agents automate evidence collection, control testing, risk assessment, and reporting. Focus your team on strategic decisions while AI handles operational tasks.
texts.Solutions:Feature:2:Title: Continuous Monitoring & Alerts
texts.Solutions:Feature:2:Desc: 24/7 monitoring of compliance posture, regulatory changes, and emerging risks. Real-time alerts ensure you're always ahead of issues.
texts.Solutions:Feature:3:Title: Unified Risk Intelligence
texts.Solutions:Feature:3:Desc: Consolidated view of risks across technology, operations, and compliance. AI-powered correlation identifies patterns and prioritizes remediation.
texts.Solutions:Feature:4:Title: Built for KSA & GCC
texts.Solutions:Feature:4:Desc: Pre-configured for NCA ECC, SAMA CSF, PDPL. Arabic-first interface. Deployment in Saudi data centers. Fully compliant with local regulations.
texts.Solutions:Feature:5:Title: Enterprise Security
texts.Solutions:Feature:5:Desc: SOC 2 Type II certified. Role-based access control. Encrypted data at rest and in transit. Comprehensive audit trails for all activities.
texts.Solutions:Feature:6:Title: ROI & Productivity Metrics
texts.Solutions:Feature:6:Desc: Built-in analytics track time savings, cost reduction, and productivity improvements. Demonstrate GRC value to executives with data.
texts.Compliance:Title: Compliance Coverage - Shahin AI GRC Platform
texts.Compliance:Headline: Built for Saudi & GCC Compliance
texts.Compliance:Subtitle: Pre-configured support for NCA ECC, SAMA CSF, PDPL, and custom frameworks
texts.Compliance:Map:Title: Compliance Across Saudi Arabia
texts.Compliance:Map:Subtitle: Interactive regional compliance metrics
texts.Compliance:NCA:Title: NCA ECC - Essential Cybersecurity Controls
texts.Compliance:NCA:Desc: Full support for all NCA ECC levels (1-5). Pre-mapped controls, automated assessment workflows, and audit-ready evidence collection.
texts.Compliance:SAMA:Title: SAMA CSF - Cyber Security Framework
texts.Compliance:SAMA:Desc: Complete SAMA CSF implementation support for financial institutions. Pre-configured controls, risk assessments, and regulatory reporting.
texts.Compliance:PDPL:Title: PDPL - Personal Data Protection Law
texts.Compliance:PDPL:Desc: Automated PDPL compliance management. Data inventory, consent tracking, breach notification, and rights management.
texts.Compliance:Unified:Title: Unified Compliance Approach
texts.Compliance:Unified:Desc: Shahin AI maps controls across frameworks, eliminating duplicate work. One evidence item satisfies multiple requirements.
texts.Compliance:Arabic:Title: Arabic-First User Experience
texts.Compliance:Arabic:Desc: Native Arabic interface and content. Right-to-left (RTL) design. Arabic regulatory language support. Built for Arabic-speaking compliance teams.
